overview: Two high schoolers make it their mission to help their friend lose his virginity before senior year. After Beetle blows it with local hottie Felicia, his friends take him on a hilarious quest to find an underground brothel shrouded in myth and secrecy, LOLA'S LOVE SHACK.
tagline: There are many ways to meet girls. This is not one of them.
title: Lola's Love Shack
